column17:
Zion Men Sunglasses - ZS-20:
Complete your summer look with these trendy sunglasses from the house of Zion. With a metal frame that is light in weight and has an elegant appeal these sunglasses can be worn easily throughout the day. The properly set nose pads high bridge and sturdy temples of this pair of sunglasses add to its comfort and durability. Further these sunglasses protect the eyes from dust particles and harmful rays of the sun. Get this pair of sunglasses from Zion and sport a fashionable look.
